scripts._mkdirs: mkdir -p dist; mkdir -p tmp; mkdir -p dist/rss
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:media
scripts.build:html: npm run _mkdirs; npm run build:html:bundles; npm run build:html:overview
scripts.build:html:bundles: node -r esm -r ./src/server/window.js ./src/server/bundles.js > tmp/bundles-ssr-rendered.html && node -r esm scripts/build.js
scripts.build:html:overview: node -r esm -r ./src/server/window.js ./src/server/overview.js > tmp/overview-ssr-rendered.html && node -r esm scripts/build.js
scripts.build:js: npm run _mkdirs; cd src; FILES=`bash -c 'ls {,browser/,components/,use-cases/}*.js'`; echo $FILES; tar -cf - $FILES | tar -C ../dist -xvf -
scripts.build:media: npm run _mkdirs; cp -R CNAME src/favicon.ico src/components dist
